# TAF template for a SAM assessment

## note to developers
before modifying these scripts please update renv packages:
```r
renv::update()
renv::snapshot()
```

note that the renv folder and lockfile are located in the boot folder.

This is a template for a Stock Assessment Model (SAM) assessment using the TAF (Transparent Assessment Framework). It provides a structured approach to conducting stock assessments, ensuring transparency and reproducibility.
